name: Braid

files.braid-game: N/A: Select the ".sh" install file downloaded from http://www.humblebundle.com

content:
exe: launcher.bin.x86
files:
- braid-game: 'N/A: Select the ".sh" install file downloaded from http://www.humblebundle.com'
installer:
- extract:
    dst: $CACHE/braid
    file: braid-game
    format: zip
- merge:
    dst: $GAMEDIR
    src: $CACHE/braid/data/x86/
- merge:
    dst: $GAMEDIR
    src: $CACHE/braid/data/noarch/
- chmodx: launcher.bin.x86
- chmodx: Braid.bin.x86
